direction: Directions to SolveEach problem consists of three statements. Based on the first two statements, the third statement may be true, false, or uncertain.
question: Tanya is older than Eric.Cliff is older than Tanya.Eric is older than Cliff.If the first two statements are true, the third statement is
answer_description: Because the first two statements are true, Eric is the  youngest of the three, so the third statement must be false.

direction: Directions to SolveEach problem consists of three statements. Based on the first two statements, the third statement may be true, false, or uncertain.
question: Apartments in the Riverdale Manor cost less than apartments in The Gaslight Commons.Apartments in the Livingston Gate cost more than apartments in the The Gaslight Commons.Of the three apartment buildings, the Livingston Gate costs the most.If the first two statements are true, the third statement is
